TextLibrary.Text: You must scan the Luminary Archive at Icarus Alpha.
Fight the Automated Defense at Icarus Alpha to reach the Luminary Archive.
The Automated Defense is down, now for the Gun Turrets!
Fight the Gun Turrets at Icarus Alpha to reach the Luminary Archive.
The Gun Turrets are down, now for the Luminary Archive itself!
Fight the Luminary Archive at Icarus Alpha.
Search the Luminary Archive at Icarus Alpha.
